name: Planet Iridium
description:
Planet Iridium is a third-person, top-down style game that sets focus
on colonizing a planet called Planet B58, better known as Planet Iridium.
Planet Iridium is a fantasy, sci-fi style game that focuses on multiple
gameplay aspects.

Our end goal is to have 3 major storylines that will have their
own set of challenges and scenarios.

Planet Iridium has 1 storyline available that's playable due to it being in Alpha.

In this play-through your main objective is to restore a run-down, abandoned facility.
Gather the necessary components to finally construct your very own colony.
With the end goal being to set up a massive intergalactic trade route with Earth.
You will also be challenged with having to fend off opposing raiders and bandits, while keeping Planet B58's inhabitants at bay.
In this game you will also have to focus on farming, building, production, logistics and
your very own players' survival, because even though this planet may appear all serene and breathtaking on the outside,
once you look a little closer and stay a little longer, it will start to show you its true colours and secrets within.

"No matter what, always remember, that you're never alone".
